p: After chemotherapy, four (9%) of 43 patients in the CHOP group underwent radiotherapy; no patients in the GEM-P arm received radiotherapy. Stem cells were collected for 16 patients (37%) of 43 in the CHOP group and 15 (34%) of 44 in the GEM-P group, with 11 (26%) in CHOP and 13 (30%) in GEM-P proceeding to autologous stem-cell transplantation in first remission. Second-line chemotherapy was administered to 15 patients (35%) of 43 in the CHOP group and 20 (45%) of 44 in the GEM-P group.
